dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Alkaline electrolyte; Potassium hydroxide solution with lithium hydroxide; KOH electrolyte with LiOH additive
Alkaline electrolyte; Potassium hydroxide solution with lithium hydroxide; KOH electrolyte with LiOH additive
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow describes an electrolyte solution incorporating an additive. It is processed to achieve a specific quality standard, ensuring compatibility and performance in its application. The processing level indicates that it is not a raw material but has undergone some treatment, possibly for purification or mixture. It conforms to relevant standards and exhibits specified characteristics for quality and usage. The production route is noted, and it includes potassium hydroxide (KOH) with an additive of lithium hydroxide (LiOH). The product flow can be part of either a production or consumption mix, indicating its presence in various stages of the lifecycle. Its availability is defined by its destination, either ready for consumer use or available at the production facility.

该产品流描述了添加了添加剂的电解液溶液。其经过处理以达到特定的质量标准，确保其在应用中的兼容性和性能。处理级别表明它不是原材料，而是经过了某些处理，可能是为了纯化或混合。它符合相关标准，并展示了品质和使用的指定特征。生产路线已标明，其中包括了氢氧化钾（KOH）和氢氧化锂（LiOH）添加剂。产品流可以是生产或消费混合的一部分，表示其在生命周期的不同阶段中的存在。其可用性由其目的地定义，即准备供消费者使用或在生产设施中可用。
dataSetInformation.sumFormula: For KOH - KOH; For LiOH - LiOH
